title: Biomarker Feedback for Smoking Cessation
text:
Summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the impact of providing light smokers with feedback about their health, including exposure to tobacco-related chemicals.
Inclusion criteria: inclusion criteria: 

 Male or female cigarette smokers, 18-75 years 

 Smoked an average of less than 10 cigarettes per day during past month 

 A personally signed and dated informed consent document indicating that the subject has been informed of all pertinent aspects of the study. 

 
Exclusion criteria: : 

 Only one subject per household may participate 

 Pregnancy
